{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$7.6K in 2021-2022** on contracts with MEDTRONIC CANADA.

Across 7 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 1 have at least one amendment (14%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 334% and the average number of amendments was 2. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$14.4M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.86 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$2.7M. The longest contract was 1.73 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$18.8M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [MEDTRONIC CANADA ULC](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22MEDTRONIC%20CANADA%20ULC%22)
- [Medtronic of Canada Ltd.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22Medtronic%20of%20Canada%20Ltd.%22)
{{< /details >}}
